articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Letter of Thanks to Officials, Working Youth and Students
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Letter of Thanks to Officials, Working Youth and Students 
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on Saturday sent a letter of thanks to the officials, working youth and students who volunteered for national defence with ardent patriotism and loyalty and the will to annihilate the enemy.
					
					 The full text of the letter of thanks reads:
					
					 Within only two days after the Supreme Headquarters of the Korean People's Army published on February 23 a crucial statement on punishing without mercy the U.S. imperialists and their south Korean puppet clique who are hell-bent on extremely reckless war moves, officials, working youth and students of universities, colleges and senior middle schools numbering 1.5 million across the country volunteered to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army.
					
					 I highly appreciate these dependable people for having volunteered for the defence of the country and the revolution burning their hearts with infinite loyalty to the revolution, ardent patriotism and the will to annihilate the enemy, and extend heartfelt thanks and militant greetings to them in the name of the First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, First Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The courageous spirit of our people, including youth and students, who gave vent to their pent-up fury on the enemy, who are running amuck to provoke our prestigious state impudently, and rose up in the sacred struggle for inflicting merciless divine punishment on them, is a demonstration of the lofty spiritual world of the great Korean people who firmly trust the Party Central Committee only and absolutely follow it, a revolutionary people who are ready to defy a bloody war, and even death, and smash the enemy if it is for the defence of justice. 
					
					 As soon as they heard the crucial statement of the Supreme Headquarters of the Korean People's Army, our officials, working youth and students, laudable sons and daughters of heroic Korea, held meetings in various parts of the country and expressed their soaring hatred against the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique and their will to annihilate the enemy.
					
					 Students of universities, colleges and senior middle schools turned out as one with a determination to take up arms in defence of the country and the revolution, and a large number of officials of the Party and the youth league as well as ex-soldiers now working at factories and farms presented earnest petitions for rejoining the army. 
					
					 The 17-year-old girl students of senior middle schools chose to become today's brave beauty Yeppuni in defence of the Party Central Committee, rather than to enroll in institutions of higher learning. Workers wrote on the petitions for joining or rejoining the army about their determination to settle accounts at the cost of their blood with the enemy who are bringing the cloud of war in their foolish dream of achieving "system destruction" in our Republic. Their burning hearts clearly showed how pure and warm the love of our people, including young people, for the Party and the country is, and how fiercely their hatred against the enemy, who are attempting to deprive them of their living base, soars.
					
					 While receiving reports on the explosive enthusiasm for enlisting in the army manifested among young people, working people and officials across the country and their determination to take revenge on the enemy, I felt great pride in having such excellent young people and revolutionary comrades, who burn their hearts with the revolutionary spirit and patriotism and never pardon injustice in the slightest, and once again gained infinite strength and courage.
					
					 That all the service personnel and people live with their lots cast in with the Party Central Committee is the genuine feature of Korea that cannot be found in any other country and in any other era, and it is the physiology of our society which the enemy can never understand. The steel-strong, revolutionary unity of the Party, the army and the people is our greatest strength incomparable to the might of scores, nay, hundreds of A-bombs or H-bombs. 
					
					 There is no people in the world other than ours who, cherishing a thoroughgoing anti-imperialist revolutionary spirit, have achieved one brilliant victory after another in the anti-U.S. showdown that has continued from generation to generation and from one century into the next. As long as it has such a great and heroic people, Songun Korea will always emerge victorious.
					
					 Now the imperialist enemy are making a last-ditch effort to check our onward advance by all means.
					
					 But they are too ignorant of our people.
					
					 Our heroic people, whom the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il trained throughout their lives, know full well what their motherland means, what a genuine life of a human being is and how they should defend the supreme dignity of the revolution and bring their happiness into reality, and are filled with a firm determination to support the leadership of the Party and the leader with their burning hearts and through an indomitable struggle. 
					
					 By leading all the service personnel and people including young people who are unfailingly faithful to its cause, our Party will completely frustrate all manner of provocative moves by the hostile forces and surely bring the final victory of the Juche revolution. 
					
					 With the same spirit and mettle as they displayed in turning out as one and volunteering for the sacred struggle for defending the country and the revolution, all the service personnel and people including young people should make redoubled efforts in the general offensive to celebrate the Seventh Party Congress as a glorious meeting of victors as it will constitute a historic landmark in carrying out the revolutionary cause of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 If the U.S. aggressors, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, and their south Korean puppets, a despicable group of traitors to the nation, eventually ignite a war, all the officers and men of the heroic Korean People's Army, our Party's revolutionary armed forces, will give vent to the indignation of the revolutionary army by firing salvoes to reduce the enemy's strongholds to rubble, and win victory in the war to make jubilant cheers for the prospering reunified Korea reverberate far and wide.
					
					 All the people including our heroic working class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a steel-strong legion of young people with a rifle in one hand and a hammer, a sickle or a writing brush in the other should thoroughly arm themselves with our Party's revolutionary view on war, intensify their anti-U.S., anti-puppet clique class consciousness and turn their soaring indignation into most strenuous efforts.
					
					 The working youth and students should achieve greatest successes conducive to building a prospering country by waging an unprecedented labour struggle and intensive studying at their workplaces and schools with the feeling that they are in the same trench as the service personnel. 
					
					 All the fronts and posts should raise the fierce flames of the general offensive to death-defyingly implement the militant tasks presented in the letter of the Party Central Committee to all its members and the joint slogans of the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the Party, and thus greet the victorious May in a dignified way carrying the records of the 70-day campaign of loyalty inscribed with heroic devotion and shining miracles as well as proud labour results dedicated to the Seventh Party Congress. 
					
					 Party and working people's organizations should conduct offensive-style political and ideological work in a concentrated way and rouse the entire Party and all society to display mass heroism as never before. By doing so, in the 70-day campaign that is proceeding forcefully day and night they can create a new spirit representative of the Mallima era of Juche Korea and a new heroic fighting mettle. 
					
					 I firmly believe that all the service personnel and people including young people, who always cherish a feeling of attachment to the garden of the offices of the Party Central Committee, will give free rein to the indomitable mental strength and the spirit of self-development they have cultivated under our Party's concern, and brave grave challenges of history so as to achieve the victory of the cause of Juche-oriented socialism and communism without fail and demonstrate the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea to the whole world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Jong Ki Jong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Jong Ki Jong
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Sunday sent a wreath to the bier of Jong Ki Jong, winner of Order of Kim Il Sung and Kim Il Sung Prize and writer of the April 15 Literary Production Centre, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Over 1.5 Million People Volunteer to Join KPA
articles.content:
Over 1.5 Million People Volunteer to Join KPA
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Officials, youths and students of the DPRK are tuning out in the sacred war for defending the motherland. 
					 According to available data, more than 1.5 million officials, working youths and students of universities, colleges and secondary schools volunteered to join or rejoin the Korean Peoples' Army (KPA) two days after the crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the KPA was issued.
					
					15,000 and 5,500 officials of the party and administration organs and the youth league in Pyongyang and South Hwanghae Province volunteered to join or rejoin the KPA.
					
					 Officials of the Committee of the Kyongsong County Party Committee, and officials of the youth league of South Hamgyong Province, Nampho City and Chosan County renewed their will to become human bombs for devotedly defending the leader in the final battle against the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group.
					
					 The numbers of volunteers to join the KPA is increasing across the country.

articles.title: Workers, Agricultural Workers Meet
articles.content:
Workers, Agricultural Workers Meet
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- There took place meetings of the workers and trade union members, agricultural workers and members of the union of agricultural workers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Taean District, Nampho City and in Anak County, South Hwanghae Province on Sunday to vow to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in the joint calls made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					 Reporters and speakers underlined the need for the workers, trade union members and agricultural workers to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the sun of Juche in high esteem, glorify their revolutionary careers and exploits and carry through their behests without an inch of deflection.
					
					 They called for making miracles and innovations in the 70-day campaign of loyalty, rallied around the party with single mind, and glorifying the Seventh Party Congress as the glorious one of victors.

articles.title: More Mass Rallies Held in Provinces, Cities
articles.content:
More Mass Rallies Held in Provinces, Cities
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in North Phyongan, South Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces, Nampho and Rason cities on Sunday to vow to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in the joint calls made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					 Present there were officials of local party, power and economic bodies and working people's organizations and officials, working people, youth and students of industrial establishments, farms and universities.
					
					 Reporters and speakers recalled that the WPK initiated the 70-day campaign of loyalty to greet its Seventh Congress with high political enthusiasm and unprecedented labor achievements and dynamically called on the whole party and army and all the people to conduct the worthwhile campaign.
					
					 They underscored the need for all sectors and units to launch the general offensive to greet May of victors with the laudable labor presents to the Seventh Congress and the 70-day campaign records of self-devotion and eye-opening miracles.
					
					 Then followed demonstrations.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Vow to Annihilate Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Vow to Annihilate Provokers
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean puppet forces set about their last-ditch scheme against the DPRK.
					 They have deployed in south Korea huge armed forces, including the U.S. special task forces and nuclear war means, advertising about what are called "beheading operation" targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "operation" for removing its nuclear and strategic rocket forces.
					
					 Enraged at such attempt, all the servicepersons in the DPRK are hardening their will to eliminate the provokers to the last one.
					
					 Pak Jong Sik, an officer of the Strategic Rocket Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA), told KCNA:
					
					 The U.S. had suffered only defeats in showdown with the DPRK for decades including the 1950s. However, it is now intending to fight a nuclear war against the DPRK which emerged a full-fledged nuclear weapons state. 
					
					 So, it is the same will of all the servicepersons of my unit to wipe out the provokers without mercy.
					
					 All the special operation forces and nuclear war means of the U.S. imperialists as well as their mainland have already been within the range of our ultra-modern strike means.
					
					 Ri Il Chol, an officer of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, said:
					
					 Our revolutionary armed forces have the powerful and ultra-modern strike means capable of dealing fatal blows to the U.S. mainland from any place at any moment.
					
					 The powerful Paektusan army makes no empty talk. Its attack means will annihilate the U.S. imperialist aggressors attempting to get the sun eclipsed and the south Korean puppet forces following them to the last one.
					
					 Kim Hyok Chol, a member of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, said:
					
					 The DPRK has been posed to the danger of war for over half a century due to the U.S. hostile policy.
					
					 If the U.S. brings dark clouds of war to this peaceful land and sky, the army and people of the DPRK will show merciless punishment to the aggressors and lead the U.S. to its final doom, by giving vent to their pent-up wrath.

articles.title: Stockbreeding Bases Increase Output in DPRK
articles.content:
Stockbreeding Bases Increase Output in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Employees of the stockbreeding bases in the DPRK have turned out in a 70-day campaign to increase production.
					 The Sinuiju and Sariwon chicken farms boost the production with fermented fodder, while the Kanggye Duck Farm is raising the hatching rate. They are also paying deep attention to anti-epizootic work.
					
					 The Hamju Pig Farm increased the farrow rate 1.7 times and the survival rate of piglets 1.4 times.
					
					 The same is true of the Phyongbuk and Kanggye pig farms.

articles.title: Kumnung Fitness Centre in Pyongyang Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Kumnung Fitness Centre in Pyongyang Draws Many Visitors
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Kumnung Fitness Centre on the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang is now crowded with many visitors, including youth and schoolchildren.
					 The two-storied center has shooting gallery, four squash courts, gym, rhythmic exercise room, swimming pool and restaurant and bathroom and other welfare facilities. The gym is equipped with 20-odd fitness apparatuses of ten kinds.
					
					 The center started its service in November Juche 102 (2013).

articles.title: DPRK Will Mercilessly Punish Those Who Hurt Its Dignity: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Mercilessly Punish Those Who Hurt Its Dignity: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK will mercilessly punish whoever hurts even a bit  the dignified supreme headquarters of the DPRK without slightest pardon, leniency and patience, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 No one can conquer the army and people who turn out in the struggle for defending the country under the leadership of the great leader. This is the eternal truth and law of history.
					
					 Under the leadership of the brilliant commanders of Songun generation after generation, the Korean People's Army (KPA) has grown to be matchless ranks leading the strong trend of history and the DPRK has emerged a military power capable of dealing telling blows at the imperialist aggressor forces. 
					
					 The DPRK has muscle strong enough to deter the enemies from igniting a nuclear war and the most powerful military capability to reduce everything to ashes at the first strike if enemies dare intrude into the sky, land and sea.
					
					 The KPA does not show any mercy to the enemies who dare hurt the dignity and social system and point an accusing finger at the sun.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK to show how deadly the strike of the KPA is and what a real war is like.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lays Bare What S. Korean Regime Is after Floating Fiction about "Military Provocations"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lays Bare What S. Korean Regime Is after Floating Fiction about "Military Provocations"
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime never opens its mouth without talking about "military provocations from the north".
					 Minju Joson on Sunday observes this in a commentary: 
					
					 The puppet regime's loud-mouthed "military provocations from the north" are nothing but a trite method to shift its criminal responsibility for escalating the tension in the Korean Peninsula and pushing the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe on the DPRK.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The non-existent "provocations" and "threat" touted by the south Korean regime are aimed to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and moves for a war against it and slander it and realize the scenario for achieving "unification of social systems" without fail. 
					
					 The above-said propaganda reveals the cunning trick to justify the criminal move to stifle the DPRK by force of arms with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 As fully disclosed, the south Korean authorities obsessed with the confrontation with the fellow countrymen and a war against the north are running amuck to stifle it by force of arms after massively introducing various types of U.S. nuclear war means and troops into south Korea. 
					
					 Absolutely unpardonable is the fact that all scenarios of the south Korean puppet forces are aimed at bringing down the social system in the north through the "beheading operation".
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the south Korean warmongers are working hard to ignite a nuclear war at any cost, utterly indifferent to peace in the Korean Peninsula and the security of the nation.
					
					 The south Korean regime would be well advised to face up to the trend of the situation and behave itself if it does not want to be forlorn wandering spirits.

articles.title: Suppression of Anti-U.S., Anti-War Actions Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Anti-U.S., Anti-War Actions Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are suppressing the anti-U.S., anti-war actions of the progressive movement organizations.
					 Lawyers of the Committee for Study of GIs Affairs of the Bar Association for Democratic Society in south Korea held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on February 16 in protest against the projected deployment of THAAD and conducted one-man demo outside the U.S. embassy.
					
					 At the Seoul Central District Court on February 23 the Bar Association for Democratic Society accused the police of banning freedom of expression.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Grabbing Tok Islets
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Grabbing Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Japan is becoming all the more undisguised in its moves to grab Tok Islets belonging to Korea.
					 According to a professor at Songsin Women's University of south Korea, Japan set up a "Takeshima (Tok Islets) room" at the Shimane Prefecture of Japan, running amuck to instill the "claim to Tok Islets".
					
					 The foolish move to grab Tok Islets is running high with the "day of Takeshima" as a momentum.

articles.title: Action against S. Korean Regime's Reactionary Rule Staged
articles.content:
Action against S. Korean Regime's Reactionary Rule Staged
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The fourth all-out people's action was staged in Seoul on Feb. 27 in protest against the puppet regime's reactionary rule peppered with sycophancy and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					 There took place a rally for all-out people's action at Seoul Square.
					
					 Speakers said that Park Geun Hye laid off workers and reneged on her commitment to ensure rice price.
					
					 They demanded the regime punish those responsible for the murderous suppression, probe the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and stop at once the import of American rice.
					
					 They denounced the regime for glossing over the crimes related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army through the humiliating "agreement" with Japan and trying to deploy U.S. THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demonstration, condemning the regime's tyranny.

articles.title: Russian Space Center Confirms Kwangmyongsong-4's Proper Operation
articles.content:
Russian Space Center Confirms Kwangmyongsong-4's Proper Operation
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The National Space Monitoring Center under the air and space forces of the Russian Defense Ministry confirmed that the DPRK's earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 is now normally operating.
					 Andrei Kallyuta, chief of the center, said this in a program of Ruskaya Sluzhuba Novostei Broadcasting Service on Feb. 22.
					
					 He added that he could draw a conclusion that Kwangmyongsong-4 is a remote controlled earth observation satellite on the basis of the information about its orbit such as the analysis of revolution period, angle of inclination at which it was put into its orbit and altitude and in other words it is capable of performing its observation function and its devices are working.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Egyptian, Brazilian Media
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Egyptian, Brazilian Media
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Egyptian and Brazilian media observed the Day of the Shining Star, birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Egyptian TV on Feb. 20 broadcast a special program illustrated with the photos showing the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The TV aired the footage of the Korean people paying tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and the events on the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al Ahrar on Feb. 15 carried articles illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 An article titled "HE Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, revered by them" said he provided the Korean people with a dignified life in the independent power and turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power, putting their dignity on the highest level. 
					
					 The Feb. 19-23 issue of the Brazilian newspaper Hora do Povo in an article noted that Kim Jong Il made tremendous contributions to the prosperity of the country, Korea's reunification and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in UK
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in UK
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show took place at the building of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) on Feb. 13 under the co-sponsorship of the Coordinating Committee of the British Friends of the DPRK and the British preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue were photos documenting his revolutionary career, and books and photos introducing the spirit of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 Participants in the film show watched a Korean film dealing with the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4. 
					
					 Present there were personages of political parties and organizations including the New Communist Party of Britain, the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and the Coordinating Committee of the British Friends of the DPRK and masses, the DPRK ambassador to UK and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, said Kim Jong Il foiled the imperialists' offensive to stifle the DPRK and turned it into a nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, praised Kim Jong Il as a distinguished great man as he developed the Songun idea in depth in the days when the confrontation between socialism and imperialism festered, and worked heart and soul for the reunification of Korea and world revolution.
					
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), noted all the achievements the Korean people made in the confrontation with the U.S. and development of science and technology would be unthinkable without the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Personages
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Diverse events were held in Russia on Feb. 11 to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a lecture and film show at the Maritime Territory Branch of the Youth Guards affiliated to the United Russia Party, a meeting and film show by the Friendship Association with Foreign Countries of Khabarovsk, a friendship meeting at the classroom of the Russia-Korea Children's Friendship Association Named after Kim Jong Il of 11th Middle School in Khabarovsk City and a film show at the Russia-DPRK friendship classroom of 5th Middle School in Khabarovsk City.
					
					 Participants of the film show watched Korean films "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" and "The Songdowon International Children's Camp."
					
					 The participants in those events laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 The head of the Maritime Territory Branch of Youth Guards said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to upholding and glorifying the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by liberating Korea, building self-supporting national economy and bolstering up the national defence capability.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory and the chairperson of the Friendship Association with Foreign Countries of Khabarovsk said Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to developing the Russia-DPRK friendly relations till the last moments of his great life, adding that the people in Khabarovsk Territory still remember his sublime image.

articles.title: Nepali National Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Nepali National Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A Nepali national preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Katmandu on Feb. 20.
					 Madav Kumar Nepal, former prime minister of Nepal, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful nationwide events praising President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Oceania Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Oceania Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- An Oceania preparatory committee for celebrating the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed on Feb. 16.
					 Peter Woods, co-chairman of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea, was elected adviser to the preparatory committee, Don Borrie, supporter of the New Zealand-DPRK Society, and Neil Fitzgerald, national chairman of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful events on the occasion of the meeting.

articles.title: UK Organization Calls for Celebrating 2017 as Holiday Common to Mankind
articles.content:
UK Organization Call for Celebrating 2017 as Holiday Common to Mankind
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A UK preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu issued a statement on Feb. 19 as regards the successful holding of the meeting.
					 The statement noted:
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of the progressive people to celebrate significant 2017, the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 5th anniversary of the election of Marshal Kim Jong Un, another great man of Mt. Paektu, to the top posts of the party and the state of the DPRK as the holidays common to mankind. 
					
					 It is a very important issue to widely introduce the noble lives of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il characterized by dedication as they ushered in a new era of independence and led to victory the sacred cause of the people's freedom and happiness and mankind's peace and prosperity.
					
					 We will widely organize colorful political and cultural events highly praising the immortal feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un as an immediate task.
					
					 We will take part in the international meeting praising the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu to be held in the DPRK in 2017 and make a positive contribution to the successful holding of the meeting.

articles.title: Philippine Organization Accuses U.S. of Finding Fault with DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Philippine Organization Accuses U.S. of Finding Fault with DPRK's Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula issued a statement on Feb. 13 in denunciation of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK in which it found fault with the DPRK's launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The statement expressed concern about the U.S. pulling up the DPRK over its satellite launch.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Kwangmyongsong-4 launched on Feb. 7 is an earth observation satellite.
					
					 The satellite will provide information necessary for the DPRK's exploration of underground resources, development of agriculture, etc.
					
					 The U.S. is terming the DPRK's clear satellite launch the "ICBM test".
					
					 The statement strongly accused the U.S. and its followers of deteriorating the situation in the Korean Peninsula under the pretext of the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de agradecimiento a funcionarios, jovenes trabajadores y estudiantes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de agradecimiento a funcionarios, jovenes trabajadores y estudiantes
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 27 un mensaje de agradecimiento a los funcionarios, jovenes trabajadores y estudiantes quienes solicitaron su enrolamiento en la defensa de la patria con la ardiente lealtad a la patria y disposicion a aniquilar al enemigo.
					El texto completo va como sigue:
					
					Fue el pasado dia 23 cuando a traves de una declaracion de suma importancia la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea puso de manifiesto su voluntad de castigar sin piedad al imperialismo norteamericano y sus lacayos surcoreanos que se entregan con frenesi a las descabelladisimas maniobras de guerra. Y en tan solo dos dias, mas de un millon quinientos mil funcionarios, jovenes trabajadores y estudiantes de centros de la ensenanza superior y de escuelas secundarias superiores de todo el pais solicitaron fervorosamente su enrolamiento o el reenganche en el ejercito. 
					
					Valoro altamente a nuestros fidedignos funcionarios, jovenes trabajadores y estudiantes por su resuelta decision de defender a la patria y la revolucion, con la ilimitada lealtad a la revolucion, el ardiente patriotismo y la voluntad de aniquilar al enemigo, y les extiendo mi cordial agradecimiento y saludos militantes en nombre del Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					El inflexible espiritu de los jovenes, estudiantes y otros sectores del pueblo que, con su incontenible indignacion ante el perverso y esquizofrenico antojo del enemigo de agredir a nuestro Estado, se han levantado en la sagrada lucha para escarmentarlo implacablemente, demuestra patentemente el elevado mundo espiritual del gran pueblo coreano que confia plenamente y sigue incondicionalmente al Comite Central del Partido, un pueblo revolucionario que para defender la justicia acaba con el enemigo sin temor a la guerra sangrienta ni a la muerte.
					
					Tan pronto como fue emitida la declaracion de capital importancia de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea, nuestros funcionarios, jovenes trabajadores y estudiantes, dignos hijos de la Corea heroica, convocaron reuniones a lo largo y ancho del pais para patentizar el odio visceral a los imperialistas yanquis y sus acolitos surcoreanos y la determinacion de aniquilarlos.
					
					Los estudiantes de los centros de la ensenanza superior y de las escuelas secundarias superiores juraron a porfia empunar las armas para defender a la patria y la revolucion. Por otra parte, solicitaron vehementemente su reenganche tanto los desmovilizados que hoy son obreros o campesinos como numerosos cuadros del Partido y de la juventud. 
					
					Tanto las alumnas del ultimo ano de la secundaria superior que han desechado la esperanza de estudiar en la universidad para convertirse en yeppuni de hoy que defiende el CC del Partido, como los apasionados obreros que han solicitado su alistamiento o reenganche en el ejercito con la determinacion de saldar las cuentas con el enemigo que pretende provocar una nueva guerra con el sueno de derrocar nuestro sistema, demuestran elocuentemente cuan puro y fervoroso es el amor de nuestro pueblo y juventud al Partido y a la patria y cuan intenso es su odio al enemigo empenado en quitarles su nido. 
					
					Al informarme del explosivo deseo de los jovenes, trabajadores y funcionarios de todo el pais de enrolarse en el ejercito y de su juramento de venganza, senti el gran orgullo de tener a excelentes jovenes y companeros revolucionarios que arden de tan elevado fervor revolucionario y patriotico y que no perdonan jamas la injusticia, y una vez mas cobre fuerza inagotable y animo redoblado.
					
					El inseparable enlazamiento de todo el pueblo con el CC del Partido es una realidad innegable de Corea que no se ha visto jamas en ninguna otra parte del planeta y la razon de ser de nuestra sociedad que el enemigo no puede comprender por mucho que trate de comprenderla. La ferrea unidad del Partido, ejercito y pueblo es precisamente nuestra mayor fuerza que no se puede comparar con decenas o cientos de bombas atomicas o de hidrogeno. 
					
					Ningun otro pueblo, con un espiritu revolucionario antimperialista tan indomable, ha obtenido sucesivamente resonantes triunfos en el enfrentamiento con el imperialismo norteamericano que persiste generacion tras generacion y siglo tras siglo. Con un pueblo tan grandioso y heroico, la Corea del Songun triunfa y triunfara eternamente. 
					
					Hoy nuestro enemigo, el imperialismo, hace desesperados esfuerzos para impedir a todo trance nuestro avance. 
					
					Lamentablemente, no conoce a nuestro pueblo y, mejor dicho, no tiene la menor idea de lo que es. 
					
					Nuestro heroico pueblo, formado por los grandes Lideres, sabe bien lo que es la patria, lo que es la verdadera vida del hombre y la manera de defender la suprema dignidad de la revolucion y disfrutar plenamente de la felicidad. Tambien esta firmemente decidido a seguir fiel a la direccion del Partido y el lider con el alma ardiente y la lucha intransigente. 
					
					Nuestro Partido, al conducir a los militares, los jovenes y a todo el pueblo ilimitadamente leales a su causa, frustrara todas las provocaciones de las fuerzas hostiles y obtendra sin falta la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche. 
					
					Con el mismo espiritu e impetu de los que se levantaron como un solo hombre en la sagrada lucha para defender a la patria y la revolucion y  solicitaron apasionadamente el ingreso en el ejercito, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular, los jovenes y el pueblo entero deben alzarse resueltamente en la ofensiva general dirigida a convertir en un evento glorioso de los triunfadores el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, que sera un punto de viraje historico en el logro de la causa revolucionaria del PTC.
					
					Si el imperialismo yanqui, enemigo jurado del pueblo coreano, y los titeres surcoreanos, banda de aviesos traidores a la nacion, encienden al fin y al cabo la mecha de la guerra, todos los oficiales y soldados del heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de nuestro Partido, destruiran por completo la madriguera del enemigo con el intenso fuego del indignado ejercito revolucionario y cosecharan la euforica victoria que hara estremecer la tierra con los vivas de la Corea unificada, poderosa y prospera.
					
					Nuestra heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, el acerado destacamento de la juventud y el pueblo entero que empunan en una mano el fusil y en la otra el martillo, la hoz y el pincel, deben identificarse con el concepto de la guerra de nuestro Partido, tener una elevada conciencia de clase contra el imperialismo yanqui y sus lacayos surcoreanos y trocar la irrefrenable indignacion en el mayor conato.
					
					A los jovenes trabajadores y los estudiantes les compete laborar y estudiar con un fervor inusitado, como si estuvieran en la misma trinchera con los soldados, y lograr exitos que contribuiran sustancialmente a la construccion de la patria poderosa y prospera. 
					
					En todos los sectores y centros de trabajo libraran energicamente la ofensiva general para cumplir a todo trance las tareas presentadas en la carta dirigida por el CC del Partido a todos sus militantes y las consignas conjuntas del CC y la Comision Militar Central del Partido. De esta manera, acogeran el mayo de la victoria con la frente bien alta, con los regalos laborales al VII Congreso del Partido y la libreta de notas de la Batalla de 70 dias de fidelidad que registra la heroica abnegacion y los admirables exitos laborales.
					
					Al realizar la labor politica e ideologica como una ofensiva y de manera intensa,  las organizaciones del Partido y las agrupaciones de trabajadores  convocaran energicamente a todos sus miembros y demas integrantes de la sociedad a protagonizar un heroismo colectivo sin precedentes, para que los 70 dias y noches engendren un nuevo espiritu que represente a la epoca de Mallima de la Corea del Juche y un nuevo espiritu heroico de combate.
					
					Estoy convencido de que los militares del Ejercito Popular, los jovenes y el pueblo entero, enlazados inseparablemente con el CC del Partido, manifestaran plenamente el espiritu indomable y la capacidad de fortalecerse a si mismos que les ha ensenado nuestro Partido, superaran con valentia los grandes desafios de la historia, conseguiran sin falta la victoria de la causa socialista y comunista del Juche y haran gala ante todo el mundo de la dignidad y poderio de la nacion de Kim Il Sung, la Corea de Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Jong Ki Jong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Jong Ki Jong
Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 28 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Jong Ki Jong, condecorado con la Orden Kim Il Sung y el Premio Kim Il Sung, escritor del Colectivo de Creacion Literaria 15 de Abril, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Militares coreanos estan decididos a dar castigo duro a enemigos
articles.content:
Militares coreanos estan decididos a dar castigo duro a enemigos
 Pyongyang, 28 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ahora los uniformados del Ejercito Popular de Corea expresan la vehemente indignacion ante las ridiculas maniobras militares de Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos destinadas a doblegar la voluntad de la Corea del Juche.
					   Los militares del EPC estan decididos a dar castigo durisimo a los enemigos que al introducir en el Sur de Corea las fuerzas armadas de operacion especial y otras agresivas, hablan ruidosamente de la supuesta "operacion combinada de descabezamiento" y de la "operacion para eliminar" las fuerzas armadas de cohetes nucleares y estrategicos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					   Pak Jong Sik, oficial del ejercito de cohetes estrategicos del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					   A pesar de que habia sufrido solamente la derrota en la confrontacion con la RPDC en la decada de 1950 y en varios decenios posteriores, el imperio yanqui se desespera ahora para estallar la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC, digno pais poseedor de armas nucleares.
					
					   Todos los oficiales y soldados de nuestra unidad estan dispuestos a eliminar a todos los enemigos desesperados.
					
					   Tanto las fuerzas armadas de operacion especial y los medios de guerra nuclear como el territorio norteamericano ya estan en el ocular de punteria de nuestros medios de ataque  ultramodernos.
					
					   El oficial de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, Ri Il Chol apunto que las fuerzas armadas de la RPDC cuentan con poderosos medios de ataque sofisticados capaces de atacar a sus anchas el territorio norteamericano en cualquier momento y lugar.
					
					   Apunto que el ejercito revolucionario Paektusan aniquilara a los yanquis, enemigos jurados y a sus titeres surcoreanos que se atreven a atentar al Sol.
					
					   El miembro del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino, Kim Hyok Chol subrayo que la RPDC sufrio el peligro de guerra durante el tiempo de mas de medio siglo debido a la politica hostil de EE.UU. 
					
					   Agrego que si EE.UU. provoca la guerra en este territorio, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos eliminaran por completo a los agresores explotando la ira de venganza para darles el arruinamiento final.
